price: Les juran por Dios para que se conformen con ellos; pero aunque ustedes se complacieran con ellos, sepan que Dios no Se complace con los corruptos.
arabic: يَحۡلِفُونَ لَكُمۡ لِتَرۡضَوۡاْ عَنۡهُمۡۖ فَإِن تَرۡضَوۡاْ عَنۡهُمۡ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَرۡضَىٰ عَنِ ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلۡفَٰسِقِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: yaḥlifūna lakum litarḍaw ʿanhum fa-in tarḍaw ʿanhum fa-inna al-laha lā yarḍā ʿani al-qawmi al-fāsiqīna
